comments:
I imported an EAR file and tried to import the same file again but the location
of the file on disk changed. The second time when I tried to import it i
selected the file location from the combo that is being persisted in the
workspace. With the location file being changed I expected an error message
displayed in the description area saying "Could not find file foo.ear" intead I
get the following exception
